  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(ArrayList<Interactable> interactables, ArrayList<Interactable> descriptionInteractables, String description, Door southDoor, Door eastDoor)

  • Method Details

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      very simple, just gets the description of the room, saying which objects are in it. DO NOT USE, you should use the getDescription in the Floor class.
      Returns:
      the description of the room as a string

    • getDoor

      public Door getDoor(Direction direction)
      DO NOT USE THIS METHOD. USE THE ONE IN THE FLOOR CLASS. This method only exists to allow the Floor class to access its doors.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction you want the door in. Accepts only South and East
      Returns:
      A door corresponding to that direction

    • getItem

      public Interactable getItem(String name, int index) throws ThingNotFoundException
      This method gets an item from the room based on a name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item
      index - which occurence of the item, starting at 0 for the first occurence. Defaults to 0 if not set.
      Returns:
      an Interactable corresponding to the name
      Throws:
      ThingNotFoundException - Throws this exception if it's not found.

    • getItem

      public Interactable getItem(String name) throws ThingNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      name -
      Returns:
      Interactable
      Throws:
      ThingNotFoundException
      See Also:
      • getItem(java.lang.String,int)

    • takeItem

      public Interactable takeItem(String name, int index) throws ThingNotFoundException
      Exactly like getItem, but it removes the item when it returns it.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item
      index - which occurence of the item, starting at 0 for the first occurence. Defaults to 0 if left out.
      Returns:
      an Interactable corresponding to the name
      Throws:
      ThingNotFoundException - Throws this exception if it's not found.

    • takeItem

      public Interactable takeItem(String name) throws ThingNotFoundException
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Interactable
      Throws:
      ThingNotFoundException

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Interactable item)
      Adds an item to the room. Designed for when the player drops an item.
      Parameters:
      item -

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited()
      Returns:
      boolean whether the room has been visited

    • visit

      public void visit()
      mark the room as visited

    • addBookmark

      public void addBookmark(String bookmarkChar, String description)
      make a bookmark for the room to mark it for later. These are visible in the map.
      Parameters:
      bookmark -
      description -

    • getBookmark

      public String[] getBookmark()
      Returns:
      String[] the bookmark in the room

      public void removeBookmark()
      Removes the bookmark placed on the room

    • getDescriptionInteractable

      public Interactable getDescriptionInteractable(String name, int index) throws ThingNotFoundException
      This method gets an interactable just like getItem, but it gets it from the description interactables instead.
      Parameters:
      name -
      index - Index is optional
      Returns:
      Interactable
      Throws:
      ThingNotFoundException
